statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, birthdate, timezone FROM user_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, timezone, language FROM user_profiles;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE birthdate >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, timezone FROM user_profiles WHERE language = 'English' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE timezone IN ('UTC', 'CET') AND language = 'Spanish' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, birthdate FROM user_profiles WHERE theme = 'Dark' OR theme = 'Light' ORDER BY birthdate ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT language FROM user_profiles WHERE timezone = 'EST';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT phone_number, username FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE timezone = 'UTC';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, language FROM user_preferences WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles JOIN user_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = user_preferences.user_id WHERE user_preferences.language = 'Spanish';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT full_name, bio FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE notification_enabled = true;
SELECT user_id, name, type FROM virtual_assistants ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT full_name, bio FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE language = 'English' AND theme = 'Dark';
SELECT user_id, name, type FROM virtual_assistants WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT user_id, language, timezone FROM user_preferences;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM user_contacts WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT action, description, timestamp FROM assistant_logs WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01'
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM users INNER JOIN user_contacts ON users.user_id = user_contacts.user_id
SELECT user_id, language, timezone FROM user_preferences WHERE notifications = true
SELECT * FROM assistant_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, birthdate FROM user_profiles WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT assistant_name, email, department FROM assistant_profiles ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, birthdate FROM user_profiles WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01'

SELECT u.user_id, u.first_name, u.last_name, a.assistant_name FROM user_profiles u JOIN user_assistant_mapping ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id JOIN assistant_profiles a ON ua.assistant_id = a.assistant_id
SELECT u.user_id, u.first_name, u.last_name, COUNT(l.log_id) AS total_logs FROM user_profiles u LEFT JOIN user_activity_log l ON u.user_id = l.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id
